name.description: The person's full name, at least first and last.

location.description: The location in which a person lives. Can be anything from a street address to a country name

street_address.description: A street address in which the person lives

locality.description: A locality in which the person lives

postal_code.description: The postal code in which the person lives, must be used with either a country or a region.

region.description: A state or region in which the person lives

country.description: A country in which the person lives

company.description: A name, website, or social url of a company where the person has worked

school.description: A name, website, or social url of a university or college the person has attended

phone.description: A phone number the person has used

email.description: An email the person has used

profile.description:
A social profile the person has used.  
List of supported profiles: linkedin
twitter
facebook
github
xing
gravatar
indeed
klout
meetup
foursquare
angellist
quora
pinterest
flickr
aboutme
youtube
vimeo
google
wordpress
instagram
crunchbase
dribbble
myspace
behance
medium
soundcloud
reddit
gitlab

birth_date.description: The person's birth date. Either the year, or a full birth date
